name: Frontend Development Basics Benchmark
description: Basic benchmark for testing frontend development capabilities

data.description: Create a React component for a responsive navigation bar that includes a logo, navigation links, and a mobile hamburger menu that expands when clicked.
Design a contact form with fields for name, email, subject, and message. Include proper validation and a submit button.
Create CSS for a card component that displays a product with an image, title, description, price, and 'Add to Cart' button. The card should have hover effects and be responsive.

data.code:

Products
